name: SUGAIN
description: Apply various types of gain to display traces

parameter_descriptions.panel: Set to 1 to gain whole data set (vs. trace by trace)
parameter_descriptions.gpow: Take signed gpowth power of scaled data
parameter_descriptions.gagc: Flag; 1 = automatic gain control with gaussian taper
parameter_descriptions.wagc: AGC window in seconds (use if agc=1 or gagc=1)
parameter_descriptions.trap: Zero any value whose magnitude exceeds trapval
parameter_descriptions.clip: Clip any value whose magnitude exceeds clipval
parameter_descriptions.qclip: Clip by quantile on absolute values on trace
parameter_descriptions.qbal: Flag; 1 = balance traces by qclip and scale
parameter_descriptions.pbal: Flag; 1 = balance traces by dividing by rms value
parameter_descriptions.mbal: Flag; 1 = balance traces by subtracting the mean
parameter_descriptions.maxbal: Flag; 1 = balance traces by subtracting the max
parameter_descriptions.scale: Multiply data by overall scale factor
parameter_descriptions.norm: Divide data by overall scale factor
parameter_descriptions.bias: Bias data by adding an overall bias value
parameter_descriptions.tmpdir: Directory path prefix for storing temporary files
